mcq.statement: Who famously stated that Pakistan came into existence when the first Muslim set foot on the soil of the subcontinent?
mcq.one_liner: The statement that Pakistan came into existence with the arrival of the first Muslim in the subcontinent is famously attributed to **Quaid-i-Azam**.
